title: Conclusions from Scatterplot
question_text: A sample of size n = 50 50 was taken of two variable, quantitative data. A scatterplot of the two variables ( X X and Y Y ) shows a moderate, negative relationship between these variables. One can conclude that

choices.text: Variable X X causes change in variable Y Y .
Variable Y Y causes change in variable X X .
As X X increases, Y Y tends to increase.
As X X increases, Y Y tends to decrease.
Nothing since the relationship is moderate, not strong.
